chargeHist.descr: 1st Degree Child Sex Assault - Sexual Contact with Person under Age of 13
1st Degree Child Sex Assault - Sexual Contact with Person under Age of 13

result.execSummary:
On one or more charges, the deferred prosecution or sentencing agreement(s) on this case were fulfilled, and the charge(s) were dismissed.

The defendant Thomas G Patrick was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).
  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Report to Probation by noon on 06/02/2011.  Deferred Agreement in effect in Count 1 of the Information for the duration of Probation.

miscConds.notes: Plus supervision fees.    If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.    $250 represents DNA surcharge.
Huber granted for work release.  (see Jail comments re Electronic Monitoring.)

No contact with:  juveniles under 18, except in public with other adults or with probation agent's prior  consent.    May have contact with: juvenile relatives unless otherwise ordered by the probation agent.    Not to possess or consume any alcohol or controlled substance not prescribed by authorized medical personnel.    Not to possess or consume any illegal drugs.
Submit a DNA sample.  Sex Offender assessment.  Confidential materials to be forwarded to probation directly by Atty J Manydeeds.
Any assessment  and counseling as required and follow through and complete all required treatment.

timeConds.notes: Probation to review health situation to determine if electronic monitoring can be authorized; and if qualifies.
